name: Jiving Jelly - Philosopher
description:
A dandy dollop of gesturing jelly! Philosopher - so earnest in its anthropomorphism, it ponders its effect on the collector, now free from its introspective jar.

This mesmerizing interactive NFT from ZIM Founder, Dr Abstract, shows the wonder of the ZIM at https://zimjs.com. Press the ZIM icon at top right to reveal Bezier handles that are being animated and wiggled with code. 

ZIM Blobs and Squiggles can be made interactive to empower the user to make their own shapes. Other objects can be animated, distributed and dragged along paths, paths can morph into other paths and path hit tests are possible.

This unique, single edition NFT, embodies the surreal vision and poetry of Dr Abstract, who is a pioneer of interactive storytelling, found in the Dan Zen Museum at http://danzen.com.

Zen, as Dr Abstract, is the inaugural member of the Gadget Minters, at https://zimjs.com/gadgetminters. To find out more about how to code interactive NFTs and to collect the ZIM NFT, see https://zimjs.com/nft.

Jelly: Blueberry, Barbera, Cherry
